imdb.plot outline: Carlo, a fast talking and snap decision maker, relocates to Florida's west coast, in a small town that he believes is off-the-beaten-path to start a new life. After a few days of what feels like a vacation, Carlo 'itches' to be in some sort of 'business'. He buys a defunct nightclub, and while rehabbing it, is found out by one of his 'former' crew members ... who is 'going on the lam'. Rocco Brunello, an attorney, also parted from the NY Crime family. Carlo, desiring to reach out to a specific few real family relatives, comes up with the idea to create a weekly cooking show, under an assumed 'stage' name after being introduced to the medium from a local foster KID and being inspired by YouTube. Against the better judgement of "Consiglieri" Rocco, Carlo creates his YouTube channel. Trouble ensues when he opens his nightclub for a weekly event called, "MOB BOSS KITCHEN", which soon becomes the next YouTube sensation and then brings offers from television and national cable stations to run the show as a weekly episode.
imdb.title: The Last Supper
plot: Carlo, a fast talking and snap decision maker, relocates to Florida's west coast, in a small town that he believes is off-the-beaten-path to start a new life. After a few days of what feels like a vacation, Carlo 'itches' to be in some sort of 'business'. He buys a defunct nightclub, and while rehabbing it, is found out by one of his 'former' crew members ... who is 'going on the lam'. Rocco Brunello, an attorney, also parted from the NY Crime family. Carlo, desiring to reach out to a specific few real family relatives, comes up with the idea to create a weekly cooking show, under an assumed 'stage' name after being introduced to the medium from a local foster KID and being inspired by YouTube. Against the better judgement of "Consiglieri" Rocco, Carlo creates his YouTube channel. Trouble ensues when he opens his nightclub for a weekly event called, "MOB BOSS KITCHEN", which soon becomes the next YouTube sensation and then brings offers from television and national cable stations to run the show as a weekly episode.::giovanni

THE LAST SUPPER, is a weekly TV show, featuring the behind the scenes look at the life of a NY Mob Boss, Vincenzo Fiorello LaGuardia (Vinny) who 'disappeared' from the family and life of crime to go 'legit' and how he tries to remain 'un-findable'.
